author: cnbc.com
title: Nexa Resources S.A. to Host Conference Call to Discuss First Quarter 2018 Results
text:
SÃO PAULO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Nexa Resources S.A. (NYSE: NEXA) (TSX: NEXA) (“Nexa Resources”, “Nexa”) announces 1Q18 Results Agenda
Nexa Resources 1Q18 Results will be published on Monday, April 30th, 2018, after NYSE and TSX market hours .
The company will host a conference call on Wednesday, May 2nd, 2018 to discuss 1Q18 results. Please note that May 1st is a local holiday in Brazil.
1Q18 Results Conference Call and Webcast
Date: Wednesday, May 2nd, 2018 Time: 10:00 AM Eastern time (NY and Toronto) 9:00 AM Lima time
11:00 AM Sao Paulo time
3:00 PM London time
Webcast: https://services.choruscall.com/links/nexa180502YuAkZBeT.html
Dial in: US: +1-866-807-9684 Canada: +1-866-450-4696
Brazil: 0800-8910015
International: +1-412-317-5415
Passcode: Nexa Resources
Conference replay:
US: +1-877-344-7529
Canada: +1-855-669-9658
International: +1-412-317-0088
Replay Access Code: 10118579
ABOUT NEXA RESOURCES S.A.
Nexa Resources S.A. is an integrated zinc producer with over 60 years of experience developing and operating mining and smelting assets in Latin America. The Company operates and owns five long-life underground mines, three located in the Central Andes of Peru and two located in the state of Minas Gerais in Brazil. For more details, please access www.nexaresources.com
